message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $15,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't sell this product for less than $13,000. It holds significant value beyond $10,000.  Let me know if you're willing to meet me closer to that price.
Hello Alice, I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to meet the price of $13,000. I would like to offer $11,000 for it. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
